scripts.web:build:vendor-dev: rm -rf web/vendor-dev; NODE_ENV=development webpack --config web/vendor.webpack.config.js || rm -rf web/vendor-dev
scripts.web: [ -d web/vendor-dev ] || npm run web:build:vendor-dev && NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server -d --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3000 --config web/webpack.config.js --inline --hot --colors
scripts.web:build: npm run web:build:vendor && npm run web:build:app
scripts.publish: set -e; npm run web:build; git checkout gh-pages; cp -R web/build/* .; git add -A; git commit -m 'publish'; git push origin gh-pages; git checkout master
